title: Order Blaster Replica
paragraphs: The Order Blaster Replica is a main weapon in Splatoon 3.
The Order Blaster Replica is designed to look like a simplified version of the Luna Blaster, containing only white and gray colors.
The Order Blaster Replica comes with Splat Bombs and Zipcaster. The Order Blaster Replica's stats, sub weapon, and special weapon are identical to those of the Luna Blaster.
To unlock the Order Blaster Replica, the player must complete Side Order with Murch's Palette.
For competitive tips about the Order Blaster Replica
Note: The strategy advice for Luna Blaster also applies to Order Blaster Replica, because of this, they share the same strategy page.
